param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆盖 的任何现有参数信息。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要对数据库进行额外的调用以获取信息。 requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information. 如果事先知道了参数信息，则通过显式设置信息更有效地填充参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 只能将 与存储过程一起使用。You can only use with stored procedures. 不能使用 向任意 Transact-sql 语句（如参数化 SELECT 语句）填充 。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types).

exception.span: 命令文本是无效的存储过程名称，或指定的 不是 。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回要执行的 对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在 上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 当应用程序调用 或 时，将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders).

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成与列名匹配的参数名（如果可能）。

span.span: to generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回要执行的 对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在 上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 当应用程序调用 或 时，将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对各种参数使用 `@p1`、`@p2`等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on, for the various parameters. 通过传递 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 参数的 `true`，可以强制 根据列名来改为生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定 ，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足在 正则表达式中指定的条件。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定 。A is specified. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders).

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作架构标识符和任何其他标识符之间的分隔符的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 要用作架构分隔符的字符。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，数据库服务器通过将标识符中的架构名称与一个字符隔开，来指示标识符的架构。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用冒号创建完整的标识符，如 Person： CustomerName，其中 "Person" 是架构名称，而 "CustomerName" 是标识符。For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 设置此属性可让开发人员修改此行为。Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetRowUpdatingHandler(class System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter adapter) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetRowUpdatingHandler (adapter As DbDataAdapter)
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string UnquoteIdentifier(string quotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function UnquoteIdentifier (quotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: quotedIdentifier
param.span: 其嵌入引号将被移除的标识符。

span.span: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.

summary.span: 给定一个带引号的标识符，返回该标识符的不带引号的正确形式，包括正确地取消转义该标识符中嵌入的任何引号。

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

returns.span: 不带引号的标识符，其中嵌入的引号已正确进行取消转义。

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
